thread.title: BRIEF-Facebook Says Friday's News Confirms Its Announcement Last Year That Foreign Actors Conducted Effort To Attack U.S. Democracy

title: BRIEF-Facebook Says Friday's News Confirms Its Announcement Last Year That Foreign Actors Conducted Effort To Attack U.S. Democracy
text: Market News February 16, 2018 / 9:27 PM / in 13 minutes BRIEF-Facebook Says Friday's News Confirms Its Announcement Last Year That Foreign Actors Conducted Effort To Attack U.S. Democracy Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 16 (Reuters) - Facebook Inc: * FACEBOOK SAYS “TODAY‘S NEWS CONFIRMS OUR ANNOUNCEMENT LAST YEAR THAT FOREIGN ACTORS CONDUCTED A COORDINATED AND SUSTAINED EFFORT TO ATTACK OUR DEMOCRACY” * FACEBOOK SAYS “CONTINUING TO WORK CLOSELY WITH THE FBI, THE DEPARTMENT OF HOMELAND SECURITY AND OTHER COMPANIES ON BETTER WAYS TO PROTECT OUR COUNTRY” Further company coverage:
